Texts.Eng: 120% Base Power with Daggers and Scythes: Scales with Int.

Press [F] to sacrifice 10 Health and unleash demonic magic that kills enemies with Current Health less than (Intelligence/3+15)% of their Max Health. They then burst into a mist that heals allies, yet causes enemies to deteriorate. Hold [Shift] before pressing [F] to summon up to six Bone Pteropods for 10 seconds, if possible: amount scales with Intelligence and enemies killed, and their Power, Armor, and Health is set to your own.
There is a 33.3% chance that enemies killed with a Dagger, Scythe, or Demonic Magic will revive and help you in battle for ten seconds.
